name: The Lying Detective
description:
The Lying Detective

A text adventure game by Taz Dixon

This short story was made in a couple days to test out writing with an interactive medium.

In addition, just in case you get confused, 'The Lying Detective' doesn't close itself after being completed, so you will have to exit yourself. Other than that, I hope you enjoy this short story I made.

~Partial spoilers from here on out~

So far the story has one ending, and may seem confusing by the end of it. But depending on how I feel, the game may be updated to have multiple endings though I feel that it's perfectly fine as it is.
